intro: Selected projects from Salesforce, CRM, integrations, and cloud architecture. The brief description provides context, the detailed view describes concrete architecture decisions, system boundaries, and technical responsibility.
description: Selected projects from Salesforce, CRM, integrations, and cloud architecture.

baywa.name: BayWa AG
baywa.description: Design of a custom middleware architecture to replace manual processes and ensure consistent data.
baywa.detail:
Responsible for conception and implementation of tailored middleware between ERP, CRM, and third-party systems.

Key Focus:
- Analysis of existing manual and semi-automated processes
- Definition of clear system boundaries and ownership per data object
- API design for stable, comprehensible data flTows
- Introduction of parallel operation (phased rollout) for risk minimization
- Monitoring and error concept for operational security

The result was a scalable integration architecture with high data integrity and significantly reduced manual rework.

peek.name: Peek & Cloppenburg
peek.description: Development of customer experience with Salesforce Experience Cloud.
peek.detail:
Architectural consulting and implementation around Experience Cloud to improve cross-channel customer experience.

Key Focus:
- Structuring of data, role, and permission concepts
- Conception of personalized journeys based on consistent customer data
- Governance for content, data maintenance, and responsibilities
- Connection of marketing, service, and CRM perspectives

Focus was less on individual features but on a sustainable overall system that remains maintainable long-term.

sennder.name: sennder GmbH
sennder.description: Modeling of new objects and processes for operational optimization and system stability.
sennder.detail:
Responsible for restructuring data models and processes in an integration-intensive environment.

Key Focus:
- Modeling new Salesforce objects to represent operational processes
- Ensuring consistent data between CRM, VoIP, and other systems
- Consulting on GDPR-compliant data storage and access concepts
- Documentation of cross-system processes and responsibilities

The goal was to make operational workflows comprehensible, stable, and understandable across organizations.

meinestadt.name: meinestadt.de
meinestadt.description: Migration from Salesforce Classic to Lightning and development of custom LWCs.
meinestadt.detail:
Support of technical and organizational migration from Salesforce Classic to Lightning Experience.

Key Focus:
- Planning a phased rollout (wave approach)
- Operation of a shadow mode phase to secure daily operations
- Development of reusable Lightning Web Components
- Consulting on architecture decisions and legacy refactoring
- Enablement of internal admins through documentation and training

The focus was on risk-minimized migration with long-term maintainable architecture.

nordmetall.name: NORDMETALL
nordmetall.description: Technical leadership in conception and implementation of a new web platform.
nordmetall.detail:
Assumption of overall technical responsibility for a new web platform.

Key Focus:
- Definition of system architecture and migration path
- Technical coordination with editorial, marketing, and external service providers
- KPI definition for reach, structure, and conversion
- Ensuring a scalable, maintainable code and system base

The goal was a platform that meets both editorial and business requirements.

bundesverband.name: Bundesverband Geothermie
bundesverband.description: Introduction of a CRM system including data structure and user training.
bundesverband.detail:
Conception and introduction of a CRM system to replace distributed individual tools.

Key Focus:
- Definition of a clean data model and clear maintenance responsibility
- Permission and role concept for different user groups
- Planning and execution of user training
- Support of organizational adoption

The focus was on acceptance, data quality, and long-term usability.

tuev.name: TÜV Thüringen
tuev.description: Digitalization and optimization of inspection processes with Salesforce.
tuev.detail:
Consulting and implementation in field service and mobile process environment.

Key Focus:
- Conception of mobile field service processes with offline capability
- Modeling of device master data and inspection objects
- Integration into existing backend systems
- Stabilization of operational workflows through clean data flows

The goal was a robust, practical solution for field service.

nordicdent.name: NordicDent
nordicdent.description: Building a scalable sales and service architecture.
nordicdent.detail:
Responsible for structuring an end-to-end sales and service landscape.

Key Focus:
- Clear process definition for sales, service, and handover points
- Building comprehensible escalation and service playbooks
- Reporting structures for operational management and executive oversight

The focus was on maintainability, user acceptance, and scalability.

traumzaun24.name: Traumzaun24
traumzaun24.description: Integration of Epicor CPQ and restructuring of complex Salesforce automations.
traumzaun24.detail:
Overall responsibility for architecture, integration, and technical implementation.

Key Focus:
- Integration of Epicor CPQ into existing Salesforce landscape
- Refactoring complex automations and APEX structures
- Definition of role-based permissions
- Building a repeatable deployment and release process

The goal was a future-proof, maintainable CPQ and sales architecture.

secmarket.name: SECMarket
secmarket.description: Conception and implementation of a CRM solution including API design.
secmarket.detail:
Greenfield project with complete responsibility for architecture and structure.

Key Focus:
- Definition of overall architecture and system boundaries
- API-first approach for backend integration
- Close coordination with backend teams for interface design
- Conducting workshops with functional departments

The result was a clean, extensible CRM foundation with clear technical responsibility.

uberall.name: uberall
uberall.description: Optimization of existing Salesforce systems with focus on user acceptance.
uberall.detail:
Analysis and optimization of an existing Salesforce landscape.

Key Focus:
- Simplification of sales pipelines and processes
- Sales enablement to increase user acceptance
- Introduction of comprehensible KPIs
- Incremental refactoring of existing automations

The goal was measurable improvement of pre-sales conversion and system acceptance.

vaitrade.name: VAI Trade
vaitrade.description: Introduction of structured sales and service processes.
vaitrade.detail:
Conception and implementation of scalable processes for sales and service.

Key Focus:
- Definition of clean handover points between teams
- Reporting structures for growth and expansion
- Technical implementation with focus on simplicity and maintainability

jakobs.name: Jakobs Medien
jakobs.description: Implementation of Salesforce Sales Cloud and quote automation.
jakobs.detail:
Introduction of Salesforce Sales Cloud including quote and approval processes.

Key Focus:
- Automated quote and approval workflows
- Template-based quote documents
- Clearly regulated role and permission concepts

The goal was a significant reduction of manual effort in the sales process.
